singlefamily22.description: Rare Dynasty Acres offering~ Discover the best of both worlds - Elegant designer home & sparkling pool on nearly 1.5 acres of AG land. Fabulous 2022 full renovation with high end finishes. This hidden gem is tucked away on a private road on Kauai's south side offering privacy, park-like open space and even distant ocean views from deck! Feel the tranquility entering your acreage & into this one-of-a-kind single story remodel. New 20ft panoramic doors opening to expansive deck overlooking pool, tropical orchard and garden area. High end finishes throughout include expanded large kitchen with 8-foot island, new appliances including 36' gas range with custom range hood, premium quartz slab counters, high efficiency mini-split air conditioning, new flooring, new windows and doors, custom marble baths and new lighting throughout. Two large bedroom suites with closet built-ins are located at opposite ends of the house and separated by great room for added privacy. Mud room with additional 4th bath option and 2-car epoxy garage. Expansive backyard with large pool. Thirty eight solar panels, Tesla power wall, underground irrigation system plus raised beds in garden area with enclosure and additional open shed, outdoor shower and pet area. Backyard is fully fenced. Fruit bearing trees on the property include: orange, tangelo, tangerine, lemon, lime, guava, banana, avocado, coconut and pomelo.  May be room to add an attached art studio or bedroom. Green house area area set up for propagating plants and trees. Available fully furnished. No sign on property.

*** Seller to assist Buyer with a $20,000 credit towards closing costs - a great way to buy down points! ***  Set atop a quiet Kalaheo residential neighborhood, this contemporary 3BD/3BA house offers sweeping mountain-to-ocean views from Mt. Haupu to Poipu. Enter through the front door and be greeted by the expansive open-concept main living area and its picture window, showcasing the captivating panoramic view. Designed with form and function in mind, the well-laid-out kitchen features ample counter space and storage in addition to the chic GE Café appliances.   Well-maintained and upgraded, the home’s list of 2022’s improvements includes: - Full interior and exterior painting - New GE Café kitchen appliances - New Trex decking at the entryway - Privacy masonry wall, featuring built-in planters with irrigation - New bathroom vanities and light fixtures - Reverse osmosis water filtration system - New exterior lighting  The fenced, gently sloping backyard offers plenty of space for relaxing, gardening, and enjoyment. Fruit trees on the property include dwarf avocado, orange, soursop, mango, banana, and papaya.   Located on the makai (“ocean side”) side of Kalaheo, the home is minutes away from quaint Kalaheo Town’s dining, boutiques, and other services. The municipal Kukuilono 9-hole golf course and park with its forested walking trails and sunset views is accessible across the street from the top of Kalaheo Drive. World-famous Poipu with all it has to offer is only a quick drive down the hill. When you’re craving beach time, both Poipu Beach and Salt Pond Beach in Hanapepe are only a 15-minute drive away. An upland area, Kalaheo is known for its views, lushness, and typically cooler climate.  Video Tour: https://kauai-home-photography.view.property/public/vtour/display/2066070?idx=1#!/

Large and spacious 4 bed/2 bath home in Lawai Valley. Most of the front half of the house has been renovated in the past few years. Highlights include the open floor plan with the bright and airy living room opening up to the dining space and kitchen. The kitchen features plenty of storage and a large pass-through to the living room. There's a flex space off the dining area which could be used as a family room. Another room in this space needs some work but could serve as a large storage area, home office, gym or craft room. The main bedroom has its own en suite which has been updated with beautiful tile-accented floors and shower. Two other bedrooms and the renovated hall bathroom round out this space.  The back half of the house is where your imagination comes into play. There's a large living area with a wet bar and sliding doors out to the back yard. It also has its own entrance. There are two other rooms down the hallway, one of which has double closets. A third bathroom is also located in this portion of the house.  Additional renovation highlights include:  * Roof replaced in 2016 with flat roof replaced in 2020 * Gutters installed in 2022 * New exterior paint in 2022   Live in the front portion of the home while you do some improvements and enhancements to the back half of the house. This could be your dream home for those that want to put a little sweat equity into their house.

Unobstructed ocean and mountain views with frequent rainbows! Feels like you're so remote but located in the heart of Kalaheo.   As you walk into the front entry you are greeted by a covered zen garden entrance. Large living area has two oversized skylights with high ceilings. Picture windows line the back of the house to show off the incredible south side views.  Fully equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances and pantry for extra storage.  Covered lanai with cable railing opens up the view and takes advantage of the Kalaheo breezes. 2 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms plus an additional den/office or additional bedroom that has sliding shoji doors.  Under the house is a huge storage area. Sellers have done a ton of upgrades, 20 solar electric panels, new gutters, electronic window coverings in the primary bedroom, exterior paint, new windows, flooring, beautiful light fixtures, the coolest spa bathroom, private dog play area, and more!  Sold fully furnished. 1572 sqft and on a 0.27 acre lot with avocado, coconuts and dragon fruit!  Must see to appreciate the style combined with the VIEWS and craftsmanship of this special home.

SOLID HOUSE ON 2.8 ACRES OF LEVEL LAND UP AN ENCHANTING VALLEY! Wind thru scenic Hanapepe Valley to your secluded spot. Newer home built with concrete and love has 3 bedrooms, living, dining, and kitchen upstairs and a 4th bedroom and bonus rooms that can be used as home office, ZOOM room, She-shed, Man-cave, or storage. Also included is an infrared sauna. Nice!  First story is concrete slab and hollow tile block walls. Second story is wood frame and siding. The open-concept upstairs is centralized with Primary bedroom and bathroom on one wing and 2 other bedrooms and a bathroom on the other wing. Vaulted ceiling upstairs adds to the spaciousness. Kitchen has 4 burner range AND the island has a brand new 2 burner cooktop - both are induction.. Hand-crafted Monkeypod cabinets grace the kitchen and you will love the pantry. Large rear lanai runs across the entire back of the home and sliding glass doors open up to it from each room. Pure municipal water, anaerobic septic system, solar water heater complete the package.  It's rare to find acreage on the Westside, and this parcel is framed by the dramatic cliffside that is the Hanapepe Valley, and adjacent to 576 acres of State land. Giant Monkeypod trees shade most of the property and there are mature fruit trees like Cacao, banana, mango, citrus and more. Most of the land is level so you could raise livestock or horses. There is even a full size container for storage next to a roofed concrete slab for cars or boat or?  Conveniently located just 16 miles from Pacific Missile Range Facility (PMRF) in one direction and Lihue in the other direction. Salt Pond is only 2.6 miles away. Port Allen is just up the hill. Historic Hanapepe Town is just down the street and Pakalas is just down the road.

Move-in ready 4 bedroom 2 bath single level home with exquisite upgrades for the discerning buyer.  Functional floor plan with lots of windows affording natural light and air flow.  Lovely patio complimented with lush foliage enhancing outdoor living, privacy and tranquil setting for the ultimate stress relief.  Situated in a quiet neighborhood surrounded by pleasant mountain views and usable landscaped yard area to call home.  Enjoy sitting in your backyard to breathtaking mountain views, tropical cool breeze and stepping stone pathway to your open air patio.  Conveniently located for easy access to Poipu, Westside and Lihue.  A true gem!

This 3 bedroom , 2 bath Lawai Valley Estates Subdivision well maintained home features a newly repainted exterior, vaulted ceiling in the living room with new vinyl flooring, spacious storage in the attic accessible by fold down ladder in hallway, large dining area off of the well appointed kitchen and a convenient laundry area near kitchen and carport entrance. Large windows and slider out to the back lanai make the home seem open and airy. The two car attached carport has a convenient storage closet with built in shelving. Short notice to show possible.

Charming home for sale in friendly Kalaheo neighborhood. Luscious tree-lined back yard with views of Elua Reservoir. Surrounding palms, ti-leaf plants, and a coconut tree create a lovely garden setting. Owner has recently had all new siding installed along with exterior paint and new windows. Oak floors in main house have been professionally sanded and refinished.   Embrace the potential of this 2bd/1ba house + attached 1bd/1ba addition (permitted). The attached addition has a separate entrance, kitchenette, and living space ideal for multi-family use or as a rental. The carport is partially enclosed for additional privacy, with full bathroom and space for home office or storage.  Easy to show main house, Tenant occupying 1bd attached unit so will need 48 hr notice to show rental.

Make this your Kauai dream home.  Spacious 3 bedroom 2 bath single story home located in Kalaheo.  Lots of potential for the right buyers to make this home their own piece of paradise.  Extra large family room ready for your creative vision. Sizable  private yard with covered porch to enjoy the lovely island weather with family and friends.   Close to community park, beaches, school, and golfing.  View 3D interactive video tour at https://my.matterport.com/show/?m=3TbXhfoUD8L&mls=1

BRAND NEW HOME, with amazing elevated south shore panoramic ocean views. A rare find in today's market, a BRAND NEW single family home build , with high quality finishes, open floor plan , high ceilings, and an additional permitted unit downstairs, with it's own electric meter installed. Nestled quietly above the coffee fields in lower Kalaheo, this home has amazing ocean view planes and is finished with beautiful quartz countertops and custom Belmont kitchen cabinetry, top quality luxury vinyl flooring throughout, with gorgeous polished porcelain walk in showers, and wall mounted (suspended) cabinets in both upstairs baths. The downstairs ARU also has it's own full kitchen and bath with stainless refrigerator and stove installed. The large open floor plan , which has the three bedroom and two bath upstairs main living area, features an open, shaded lanai with ceiling fan facing the coastline, large open  kitchen , and a large finished laundry/utility room.

This meticulously maintained home has 2 bedrooms and 1.5 bath and could be yours today!   Tucked away in the hills of Kalaheo, the property provides a relaxing setting overlooking a quarter acre of green. The mature Norfolk pines surrounding the home provide a sense of privacy to be appreciated.   The open floor plan creates a wonderful setting for all your gatherings. The large covered screened lanai adds more space for your guests and provides a wonderful place to relax, enjoy a meal or your morning coffee. The house comes furnished, making it easy for you to move right in and enjoy your new home. Inventory list will be provided in escrow. A set of plans for a 2 bedroom 1 bath addition will come with the close of escrow and will be available to see at the home.  Features of the home as follows: *New paint inside and out *Separate laundry room *Oversized pantry with plenty of shelf space *Additional 288 sq ft lanai *Fenced in back yard for your furry friends *Burmese teak hardwood floor *Double pane windows *Custom cabinets *Copper and aluminum kitchen counter tops *Kitchen and hallway skylights *Custom blinds *Updated appliances (Gas stove

Single family, single story, 3 bedroom 2 bath home. Mountain views, cul-de-sac location, large backyard, lava rock wall. Granite countertops, Pergo like floors and other improvements have been made to update the original redwood home. The garage was turned into a large game room. The appropriate permits were pulled for the conversion and the CO received. The second bathroom is in the game room area and appears to be a conducive floor plan for a studio like area. Conveniently located within walking distance of Kalaheo restaurants, clinic, shops, post office and more. The property is owned by a trust and is being sold AS IS.

Perched on a hill above the Pacific Ocean, this well-appointed Kakela Makai home boasts 180 degree ocean views and naturally welcomes in the trade winds off the sea. The main living area of 1,520 sf consists of 3 bedrooms and 3 baths with the attached 1-bedroom/1-bath Additional Dwelling Unit is perfectly suited as an in-law apartment or rental unit. The ground-level ADU is appointed with a full kitchen, private entrance and laundry. Kakela Makai Oceanview Subdivision amenities include a private club house, pool and spa, and some of the best ocean views available in Kalaheo. It's also located just minutes from town with restaurants, stores and beaches aplenty.  Features include: —Ipe Decks —Brazilian Cherry floors —Silestone Counter tops —On-demand (tankless) Ranai hot water heater —CertainTeed® 40 year roof —Silent alarm system —Hardi Plank durable siding —2 car garage —Flexible floor plan with additional dwelling  Check out virtual tour via listing link.  Downstairs unit is a permitted ADU

A must see for the fabulous panoramic ocean view of Kauai's Southside Coastline.  The home boasts a tropical flair of outdoor-indoor living with an expansive lanai that also overlooks a lush backyard. Two bedrooms have sliding glass doors to access the lanai.  Lots of privacy. There are 2 separate garages, 2 water heaters.  A separate office space gives Zoom conferences the right amount of privacy.  A downstairs bonus room can be used for exercise or craft room.   The home upgrades include: New roof - heat reflecting with warranty New luxury vinyl flooring in living space and bathrooms New kitchen - with quartz top and wood cabinets with custom features (i.e. pull out spice rack, etc.) New triple sink in kitchen New toilets & cabinet Lightweight storm stoppers for easy handling.

Lawai Hillside Home awaits you on the South Shore of Kauai - 3 BEDROOMS AND 2.5 BATHS WITH OFFICE   Spacious single level open floor plan built in 2002 with large great room and covered patio leading out the Tropical Landscaped Backyard  2 car garage of approximately 576 square feet with ample street parking located on a cul de sac street  Laminate flooring in each bedroom Corian counter tops Maple Cabinetry  Cedar lined walk in closet in primary bedroom Primary bedroom has access to backyard patio Split A/C system in great room area  Fruits to enjoy include Avocados, Papayas, Tahitian lime, Meyer lemon.  Large yard for pets or gardening. Convenient location to Poipu Beaches and Lihue with approximate distances of 11.4 miles to Kauai High School, 9.9 Miles to Island School and only 9 Miles to Poipu Beach Park

FLEXIBLE FLOORPLAN! Wait until you see the attention to detail in this spacious 3 bed/ 3 bath residence currently used as 2 unit flex-space. Live in one and options for the other, or make it one big family home. Newer EVERYTHING! Roof is less than 4 years old. Newer electrical system. Newer plumbing with 2 on-demand water heaters.  Craftsman kitchen with island. Stainless steel appliances include gas range for real cooking. Abundant custom cabinetry provide ample storage. Custom tilework in both bathrooms. Six foot jetted-tub in one bathroom and oversized walk-in showers in the other 2 bathrooms. Trade-winds and ceiling fans keep it cool and comfortable. Built-in shelving in key locations will be appreciated. More storage in the attic with pull-down ladder.  Speaking of studs, owner went so far as to replace the 2x3 framing with 2x4s, then insulated the walls, then fresh sheetrock back on. Newer Travertine tile flooring throughout. Owner installed tongue and groove 3/4" wood planks in the vaulted ceiling, then finished everything off with recessed lighting, accent lighting, and down lighting. Newer window frames. Two private exterior Ipe-decked lanais with outdoor showers. Even the lava-rock wall was dismantled and rebuilt with hollow-tile block wall core and lava-rock exterior.   Lush Lawai location makes it easy to jump on the highway and head to town, beach, or wonderful Westside. Conveniently commutable to Lihue and PMRF.

Beautiful ocean and mountain views along with cool Kalaheo breezes await you in this 3BR/2BA home perched near the top of Kai Ikena Drive. The large, open concept living area is situated perfectly to take in those views and breezes. You'll have plenty of room to entertain in the combined living/dining/kitchen area which leads you out onto the expansive lanai. The kitchen is sure to please with its solid wood cabinets, granite counters and stainless steel appliances. You'll also find two guest bedrooms and the full guest bath on this floor. The entire top floor is your own private retreat - large master bedroom with its own fully covered lanai, walk-in closet and master bath. Again, the views are stunning. If you're able to take yourself away from the views at the front of the home, you'll enjoy spending time in your fully fenced in back yard where you can spend hours gardening and tinkering. There's plenty of storage for your vehicles or toys in the oversized 3-car garage with additional space for parking in the large driveway. All of this and you're just a short walk from Kukuilono Park and all of the amenities that Kalaheo offers.  Be sure to check out the virtual 3D model here - https://my.matterport.com/show/?m=MZztzpfALfy&brand=0&mls=1&

Enjoy Kalaheo living in this spacious, remodeled home with big mountain views! 3854 Gallo Pl boasts 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, 2 living rooms, plus a bonus room, all totaling 3,496 sqft of indoor living space. This home's flexible floor plan will allow its new owner many options.  The main level features a completely remodeled kitchen, large living room, lava rock fireplace, 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and a bonus room that could be an office or another bedroom.  The lower level of the home also has a large living room with fireplace, a wet bar, 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom and a bonus room. The lower level also has its own separate entrance.  Key features include: *ADU or guesthouse possible (verify with county) *Freshly painted interior and exterior *All new kitchen appliances *Monkey Pod kitchen counters & shelves *New custom kitchen cabinets *Upgraded bathrooms *New vinyl flooring & carpet throughout *2 fireplaces *New recessed lighting *New fans *Lava rock wall *New roof in 2018  Located just down the hill from Kalaheo, this home has many conveniences nearby. You can walk to Kukuiolono Park & Golf Course in 10 minutes, or take a short drive to the many eateries and shops within Kalaheo. When you are ready for some beach time, Poipu and Salt Pond are only 15 minutes away.

A drive to the top of Puulima Road is to discover a bit of unexpected seclusion.  Walking in the front door of this home greets me with a sense of peace. I found myself immediately inspired by the finishes, hardwoods, high ceilings, soft color palette... the essentials of a home that is a modern-day version of a Hawaiian plantation home, with all of the care associated with that.  I was escorted about by the homeowners who showed me the enchanting things that make this home so special to them. I asked them what they loved about it and one of my favorite responses was showering under the stars in the outdoor shower with the fragrant lavender orchids that are attached to the lava rock wall. The chef’s kitchen is perfect for making elaborate meals while gazing at the ocean, and the island range allows the chef to remain engaged with guests. The oversized office can be shuttered from the rest of the home for privacy and distance work.  My favorite part of the home is the screened-in lanai with its valley and ocean views and cool breezes. I thought that I could live in that one space but there is so much more to enjoy.

PANORAMIC OCEAN VIEWS and RAINBOWS!!! Magical views of the entire South Coast of the Garden Isle, including sunrise and sunset vistas from this custom home in the Kakela Makai OceanView subdivision in Kalaheo. Cooler temperatures and a welcome breeze make Kalaheo the most comfortable town on Kauai.  The property includes a main home and a separate studio apartment above the detached 2-car garage (for additional income or for your family/guests). Both units have solid (3/4") maple floors.   The main house consists of 2,592 sqft of living area with 3 bedrooms and 2 baths downstairs. Upstairs you'll love the huge living area, kitchen and the third bathroom. The spacious entrance foyer and the stairwell to the Great Room upstairs has a new stainless steel and aluminum "contemporary" railing system. Granite counter-tops (Blue Pearl) and updated stainless steel appliances. The full sized washer & dryer is on the ground floor adjacent to the bedrooms. Two covered lanais, both at 360 sqft, boast incredible ocean views. From the upstairs lanai you can see an area where mother whales come each year with their calves.  The studio is 576 sqft and includes a full kitchen and bath, full size washer and dryer and has ocean and mountain views. The 2-car garage is also 576 sqft.  The HOA fees are extremely low at $70/month and include the following amenities; swimming pool, jacuzzi, showers, recreation room and barbecue.   An additional benefit is the home's proximity to Kukuiolono Park and Golf Course, just up the street and a walk away. The golf course itself has wonderfully expansive vistas of the South and West coasts, Pacific Ocean and Niihau (the forbidden island).  Don't miss your chance to call this beauty yours. Be sure to check out the 3D virtual model here - https://my.matterport.com/show/?m=L3B3gVDSfqU&brand=0&mls=1&

This Kalaheo corner lot property consists of a 3 bedroom, 2 bath main home together with a 1 bedroom, 1 bath cottage which is permitted as an Additional Dwelling Unit. Both the home and the cottage are separately metered for water and electric. The lot is elevated over street level - so the main home has beautiful distant ocean views overlooking the coffee fields. It is a short walk to a small county park at the corner where Waha Road meets Niho Road. The property is tenant occupied and requires 48 hours notice to show. Please do not disturb tenants - dog on property.

Two plantation era dwellings in a very private setting are located on half an acre in Kalaheo Homesteads and allow for the flexibility of extended family, guests, home office or potential income. Enjoy expansive views toward Mount Kahili.  The 3-bedroom one bath home has hardwood flooring throughout the living area and bedrooms. East facing living room picture window frames the view across vacant land and surrounding valleys. Louvered windows from the bedroom/bath wing to the south look out to the private level backyard with terraced area and fruit trees down below. 4 steps down from the kitchen you'll find what was once a 2-car garage that is currently an enclosed unpermitted Rec Room/storage area with laundry room, laundry tub, stacked washer/dryer and toilet room on the back side. The natural slope of the property and post and pier construction lends itself to a large storage space under part of the home, perfect for yard tools, mango pickers and hanging endless bunches of bananas.   A 1 bath Studio was moved to the parcel in 2010 creating a fully permitted ADU by 2013. It was secured on a concrete block foundation; and a front porch was added. The sloping terrain of the side and back yard allow for storage space under the dwelling.  The terraced backyard provides seasonal grapefruit, mango, tangerine, tangelo, orange, lemon, not to mention Apple and Williams’ bananas, mac nuts, strawberry guava, guava, rambutan, 4 mature avocado trees blooming and fruiting at various times throughout the year and beautiful tropical flowers and vegetation.   Carport, lean-to and attached storage shed provides parking for 2 vehicles, various outdoor toys and storage. Spacious cement driveway has ample parking for both dwellings as well as guests. Kalaheo town and amenities is just 2 miles down the road with Poipu Beach and incredible sunsets 20 minutes away.

Located at the end of a cul-de-sac on Kauai's south side, this one level home has many updates. New flooring, new kitchen cabinets, counter tops and appliances. Freshly painted, new water heater and very spacious outdoor space which the previous owner did most of his living. Fully fenced yard which offers lots of privacy. Outside shower and covered carport. Easy access to the highway to take you right to the beaches.

Privacy... Seclusion... Ocean Views & Open Space!  Welcome home! Spacious 4 bedroom 3 bath home with some ocean views from living room and master bedroom..2,052 square feet of living area, situated on a landscaped 1.04 acre lot. Lots of windows to let the light and cool Kalaheo breezes in.  Enjoy the sunrise and sunset from your living room. *Wolf Gas cook top *Double pantry *Split AC in master bedroom *Solar water panels *Outside shower *Avocado, lime, orange, banana, mountain apple and mango trees

Stunning corner lot, custom home with Breathtaking Ocean and Mountain Views, in the sought-after Kai Ikena Subdivision.   Large picture glass windows with cathedral style ceilings, illuminates the open space Living and Dining Rooms.  The Spacious Kitchen designed for a Gourmet Cook, features an Island with a Gas Stove, Double Ovens and Granite Countertops.  Three Bedrooms all open up to a 1,105 sq. ft. wrap around lanai, featuring breathtaking views of Kaua'i.   Master suite has a walk-in-closet and gorgeous Ocean and Mountain Views.  Two bathrooms, featuring a contemporary, fully remodeled master bathroom and guest bathroom with special upgrades.    Bonus Room of approximately 800 Square feet, has been fully remodeled  Beautiful, manicured yard with tropical fruit trees, including dragon fruit, banana, lemon, lime, mango, papaya, orange tangerine, mountain apple and many more.  Downstairs Laundry Room with convenient upstairs shoot   Most notable of $200,000 improvements between 2018 - 2022:     *Central Air Conditioning *Custom Bamboo blinds in living and dining rooms *Black-out Shades in all bedrooms *Exterior Paint *Interior Paint *New Washer, Dryer and Dishwasher  *New Screens on doors and windows *Yard Landscaping  Located in Kalaheo, Kauai, just above the popular south shore, close to the main island highway.  Just minutes away from the beautiful ocean and beaches in Poipu!!!  Be sure to check out the 3D virtual model here - https://my.matterport.com/show/?m=S8z2GL1VZvA&brand=0&mls=1&

Charming single-level 3 bedroom, 2 bath home in the quaint Lawai Valley Estates neighborhood on the South shore.   A 2 car carport and open patio in a back yard with pleasant mountain views.  Delicious fruit-bearing lychee, banana, papaya and mature citrus trees in the landscaped yard.   Master bedroom, master bathroom upgraded and living room recently painted.  Conveniences of a tankless water heater and gas meter.  The rest of the house is an easy canvas for the new owner to add their own touches.  A short drive to sunny Poipu, down the road from Kalaheo town and easy access to Lihue or Westside.  Sold "As Is".

Come home to this 3 bd 3 ba home on the makai side of Kalaheo. Located on the upper side of the cul de sac affords wide ocean panoramas from Mt. Haupu to Ioleau mound. Watch whales and check the surf from home! The well thought out floor plan maximizes scenery; almost every room boasts a wide swath of ocean blue.   You're welcomed to the home by a new and partially covered Ipe Deck with cable railings. The spacious living area has large windows and vaulted wood ceilings. Up a half-flight of stairs is the open concept dining and kitchen area, a beautifully updated bathroom, a 2nd bdrm, a generously sized laundry/storage closet, and access to the backyard. The kitchen boasts ample cabinet storage and 2 pantries, stainless steel appliances, bar seating, and has clear sightlines to the back & front yards, and the ocean beyond. Down a few steps is a 3rd bdrm that opens to the front deck. The upper level of the home is a 406 sf air conditioned Primary Suite with a wrap-around balcony, freshly renovated bathroom and walk-in closet, and an additional 100 sf of loft storage.   The 9,548 sf lot has a fairly level lawn out front, perfect for play. Out back is a large deck with steps down to a fenced backyard, firepit, raised garden bed, storage shed, and fruit trees including avocados, mango, banana, citrus, ginger, and jaboticaba. Out back you'll notice the Tesla Powerwall backup battery to accompany the 18 panel PV array. The panels are 410 watt Sunpower Residential A-series panels with Maxeon technology, the highest wattage home solar panels available.  And just when you thought it couldn't get better - the home also has a well appointed flex-space and is close to amenities like Kukuiolono park, Kalaheo town & Kalaheo Elem.  The flex space, accessed through a separate entrance at the main level, has its own bathroom making it prime for a home office, craft area, or multi-generation living.

PRICE REDUCED BY $250,000.  Nestled on nearly 2 acres next to Kukuiolono Park & Golf Course, the 1134 Pu'u Road Estate with its sit down, through and through South Kauai coastline, blue ocean and green mountain views, awaits the buyer.   This  tasteful, well-designed island home has been occupied and meticulously maintained by the original owners since inception, and features 3,780 sqft of indoor-outdoor living.   The 1134 Pu'u Road Estate offers an expansive lawn, exquisite landscaping, infrastructure which drains rain runoff away from the home, and the natural cooling of ocean trade winds. The home's oceanview lanai is truly a world of zen for your morning coffee or evening libation. Looking east to view the ocean sunrises and looking west to view the ocean sunsets, this one of a kind property offers panoramic views from Poipu to Port Allen and Ni'ihau.  The size of the parcel and location of the home offers incredible improvement options such as a swimming pool, a spa, or a party pavilion.  The well-built two-story home's many features include:  10 ft Ceilings Bamboo Flooring Living and Dining area Kitchen and Family area Propane Cooktop and Wall Oven, Granite Countertop Three Bedrooms and Office Area Attached Two-Car Garage Wrap Around Lanai Windows manufactured by Coastal Windows, Honolulu Fiber Cement Siding manufactured by James Hardie Self-Sealing Neoprene liner under Composition Shingles Photovoltaic System with transferable net metering Solar Hot Water System Gutter, Downspout and French Drain system efficiently carries rainwater away from home.  Once part of the McBryde Estate, this property is one of the Two-Unit Condominium Propety Regime (CPR). A substantial custom home was built on the 3-ac second Unit.   Do yourself a favor and do not miss viewing a slice of heaven today! East to show.

CUSTOM BUILT HOME IN THE LAWAI HILLSIDE SUBDIVISION ON KAUAI’S SOUTH SHORE!   Located in a lush yet manicured tropical setting with great curb appeal on a quiet cul-de-sac, this inviting home in Lawai Hillside consists of 2 BR/3.5 BA + loft and features high vaulted open beam ceilings, custom wood cabinetry and finishes, a spacious garage and is just short drive to area beaches, golf courses, restaurants, shopping and schools.  Some of the features of this property include:  * 2BR/3.5BA + LOFT (1,344SF) * 10,742SF Lot  * Attached Garage (672sf) * Solar Hot Water System * Vaulted Open Beam Ceilings * Spacious Back Yard * Front and Back Lanais * Fruit Trees (orange, banana) * Laminate Flooring in Living Area * Carpet in Bedrooms and Loft  Property is being sold as-is. The red outline on the last photo does not indicate the actual boundaries and is just intended to provide a general idea of where the lot boundaries are.

This nearly new home shows pride of ownership. Built in 2018, the owner added beautiful landscaping and fully fenced in back yard. Central Air was install in all rooms including the master closet to keep your clothes fresh. The house was freshly painted 2021 in to more island friendly color. The owners also added a staircase to the back yard for easy access and an organic vegetable garden. The kitchen and dining areas have updated tile that goes well with the engineered laminate flooring throughout. The high ceilings and large master bedroom with exterior access add to the livablitily of this home. Views from the extra large lanai of the Kalaheo mountains are a beautiful vista as you BBQ or dine outside. Fruit trees include: Lime, Mandarin clementine, Meyer lemon, Ginger, Avocado, Apple Banana.

Palekaiko is the Hawaiian word for Paradise, and this custom 3 bedroom, 3.5 bath home in Kakela Makai Oceanview was lovingly given this name as it is truly a beautiful home in paradise. The home was built by prominent Kauai builder, Bob Jewell, and offers quality construction with attention to detail. Situated on a corner lot, the home is positioned to capture the breathtaking panoramic ocean view, while offering a generous and terraced backyard. BACK ON THE MARKET! Tucked away on a private road on Kauai's south side is a hidden gem of a home on 2.6 acres of land. Designed by noted Big Island architect, the late Boone Morrison, and constructed by Kauai-builder Bob Mikkelsen, the home combines an overall feeling of Hawaiiana with the clean lines of mid-century modern design—truly a one-of-a-kind. Boone employed a practice of designing large, usable rooms, lighted by massive windows on several sides, with soaring ceilings and gleaming hardwood floors. This over 3,000 sf home is a wonderful example of his work.   Slate floors greet you at the entrance of the home and into the kitchen and baths. Custom woodwork, including the remaining flooring, lanai, custom trim work and beams, is featured throughout the home, all from locally-sourced hardwoods. The home was constructed in two phases, with the entry, kitchen, large dining room, primary suite and additional bath on one side, and the grand living room and loft/office on the other. The two structures are connected via a 1000 sf covered lanai, adding an abundance of usable outdoor living space to the overall footprint of the home. The total combined square footage under roof is 4355. Guest house rights are included with the property.  The current owners have transformed the land into a botanical garden with one of the most extensive collections of rare palms and cycads in the Hawaiian Islands.
